industry: Retail Apparel and Fashion and Entertainment Providers
description: Our client, a large entertainment company with an office in Glendale, California is looking for Merchandise Coordinator to join their Consumer Products team for a 6 month contract! Please note - this role will work onsite Monday through Thursday with Friday remote.
responsibilities:
Provide operational support for the department (placement grids, management and execution of the assortment and vendor base)
Maintain the assigned department's range plan including item setup, updates and stage sets
Purchase order creation, maintenance and delivery tracking of all orders in the company database system
Manage daily promotional price change entries and departmental promotion activity
Manage licensed vendor setup, PRRs, gather testing reports and handle general vendor communication
Maintain product flow documents to reflect stage set changes and process launch date changes
Manage incoming samples, archiving and storage
Create assortment line sheets
Obtain images and copy points needed for the website
Coordinate and provide rework direction to Distribution Center for non-compliant or assorted sku orders
Coordinate with the DC and inventory control to RTV (Return to Vendor) product as needed
Maintain and update inventory chase log-weekly
Track inventory levels on dropship skus to ensure merchandise is in stock with licensee

qualifications.required:
Bachelor's degree in a related field
3+ years of experience in a Coordinator role
Strong computer skills (Excel, Power Point, Word, Keynote)
Self-starter and motivated but able to ask for assistance when uncertain
Ability to project manage and capable of meeting deadlines and dealing with time constraints
Possess strong analytical and organizational skills
Excellent interpersonal, solid written and verbal communication and presentation skills
Resourceful, innovative and responsive to change
